task_group: Frontend SDKs - Mobile, Desktop, And Game Clients

tasks.title: Mobile Platform Contract Adapters
deliverables: Platform-specific transport adapters for websocket, reconnect, and background handling.
Token lifecycle integration patterns for secure mobile storage.
Push/notification event hooks aligned with presence/message flows.
acceptance_criteria: Mobile SDK adapters preserve core event semantics and auth flow.
Background/foreground transitions do not corrupt session state.

tasks.title: Flutter Unified Client
deliverables: Dart package mapping core chat/presence/webrtc events.
Interop-safe model serialization aligned with backend schemas.
Minimal UI binding helpers for common chat list and message stream rendering.
acceptance_criteria: Flutter client supports token refresh and socket reconnect flows.
Type/schema mismatches are caught in contract tests.

tasks.title: C# Game/Realtime Adapter
deliverables: C# SDK profile optimized for game loop constraints and predictable allocations.
Event buffering and dispatch strategy for frame-safe processing.
Realtime state synchronization guidance for multiplayer/chat overlays.
acceptance_criteria: Unity-targeted adapter handles high-frequency event streams without frame spikes.
Connection state transitions are deterministic and inspectable.

tasks.title: Secure Local Persistence And Background Reliability Policies
deliverables: Platform-specific secure storage policy for tokens/session cache (encrypted at rest, keychain/keystore usage).
Background/foreground reconnect and backoff policy with jitter and network-awareness controls.
Battery/network mode behavior guidelines for presence and realtime subscriptions.
Data purge policy for logout/session revoke events across platform caches.
acceptance_criteria: Sensitive session artifacts are never persisted in plaintext in supported platform profiles.
Background resume does not produce inconsistent session state or duplicate event sends.
Logout/revoke actions clear local sensitive caches deterministically.
